page.title: 10CHILDREN'S SPARE TIME.
page.content: Our study of children's spare time in 1985 showed that these things were most popular .The most popular collections are in order, rubbers, stamps and books.People collect things for decoration and fun in Mansfield. Sport was the most popular hobby with reading second and eating third. In 1985 the most popular holiday for children is Majorca and most popular form of travel is by air. The most popular outdoor game is marbles and the second most popular is hotrice.The favourite indoor game is monopoly,followed by the Game Of Life.
